p: Secondary outcomes were the number of failures ( i. e. no results because of an operational issue) of the rapid RT-PCR assay, the number of tests performed during night-shifts and at weekends, and the time between the patientâ€™s entry into the study and obtaining the results of the rapid RT-PCR assay. Patient entry time was defined as the time that the administrative record was created; it occurred just before evaluation by the triage nurse. We also wanted to describe the activity of the triage and the emergency department when RT-PCR assays were performed.
